item.title: Errors I came across adding Staticman to my Jekyll Blog for a Comment System
item.description: There are way better resources that teach you how to add staticman to your blog. You are better off with those ones. Now with the disclaimer out of the way, we can move on with how to deal with errors. [GITHUB_READING_FILE] What this basically means, is that staticman cannot find your staticman.yml file in your repository. Now if you are like me, an idiot, you would be thinking that this is in my local repository how do I even….
